divs: Sighting DetailsI was watching TV on the couch, when my sister went into her room and can out screaming, we went to go check and There was 8 different lights that came up from behind a tree within 5 minutes all the same distance apart, then went to the same place and disapeared,some a little different but the same small area of the sky. one fly down towards the south more, but dissapeared. then another 8 came up and did the same. the were lights and they were rotated around each other...My feelings were peace, like everything was alright...
Summary: There was 8 different lights that came up from behind a tree within 10 minutes all the same distanec about, then went to the same place and disapeared, then another 8 came up and did the same
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Coquitlam
There were no other sightings in Coquitlam on or around February 19th 2013
